scripts.prerelease: git checkout master && npm run compile; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/';
scripts.release-patch: npm run prerelease; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm run prerelease; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm run prerelease; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
